r.d: "Lua is a powerful, fast, light-weight, embeddable scripting language." This extension embeds the lua interpreter and offers an OO-API to lua variables and functions.
r.n: - Fixed #65097 (nApplyCount release missing) (emptyhua at gmail dot com) - Trigger E_STRICT when pass an array with index '0' to lua instead of ignoring it - added support for callable functions and closures as values returned injected into lua engine (harald at octris dot org)
